articles.author: Sakshi Tiwari
articles.title: When Israel ‘Murdered’ Pakistan’s President! Recollecting US Diplomats Wild Claims Amid Iranian Tragedy - EurAsian Times
articles.description: When the Bell helicopter carrying Iran’s President and Foreign Minister crashed earlier this week, several Iranian citizens and military watchers speculated that Israel could be behind the assassination. This was not the first time Israel was ‘accused’ of the…
